markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ball Python](/Monsters.aspx?ID=380)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

This nonvenomous snake’s name comes from its tendency to curl into a ball when frightened, though most people know it for its hunting tactic of coiling around prey and crushing victims with its powerful muscles. Nonetheless, brave herpetologists sometimes keep ball pythons as pets.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Snake_BallPython.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Ball Python](/Monsters.aspx?ID=380)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 302</row>

**Perception** +6; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 20

**Tighten Coils** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature grabbed or restrained by the ball python attempts to Escape. **Effect** The DC of the Escape check is increased by 2.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +8,
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing plus Grab

**[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" />  1d8 bludgeoning, DC 17

**Wrap in Coils** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirement** A Medium or smaller creature is grabbed or restrained in the ball python’s jaws. **Effect** The ball python moves the creature into its coils, freeing its jaws to make attacks, then uses Constrict against the creature. The ball python’s coils can hold one creature.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-93" />
name: Ball Python

text: Ball Python This nonvenomous snake’s name comes from its tendency to curl into a ball when frightened, though most people know it for its hunting tactic of coiling around prey and crushing victims with its powerful muscles. Nonetheless, brave herpetologists sometimes keep ball pythons as pets. Effect The DC of the Escape check is increased by 2. --- Speed 20 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet Melee Single Action jaws +8, Damage 1d8+3 piercing plus Grab Constrict Single Action 1d8 bludgeoning, DC 17 Wrap in Coils Single Action Requirement A Medium or smaller creature is grabbed or restrained in the ball python’s jaws. Effect The ball python moves the creature into its coils, freeing its jaws to make attacks, then uses Constrict against the creature. The ball python’s coils can hold one creature.
